channel.title: Blogdown on Data InDeed
channel.description: Recent content in Blogdown on Data InDeed

item.title: Switching to Blogdown & Hugo
item.description: I’ve decided to switch to Blogdown/Hugo. For those interested, I used the method presented by Robert Myles McDonnell. It was the simplest and most clear cut way to implement blogdown/Hugo on GitHub, which is quite different from Jekyll. Over the next few weeks, I plan to tweak all of the customization and make the complete migration! Until next time…
